member.name: M:CPS.Controllers.CalendarController.GetCalendarsList
member.summary: This Endpoint Gets a list of Calendar Results.
member.remarks:
**Sample Response** (*ColorCode property name has been updated to HexaDecimal*)**:**
{ "hexaDecimal": "#b096c6", "parentID": 0, "status": "ACTIVE", "tagID": 0, "type": "categories", "calendarID": 1149, "calendarName": "Accountability Redesign" }
